name: scan and write clients
func:
import os
import subprocess
import requests

dir='/home/pi/openscan/clients/'

numberofscans=3

filelist = [ f for f in os.listdir(dir)]
for f in filelist:
    os.remove(os.path.join(dir, f))

def test_slave_online(url):
    try:
        with requests.get(url, timeout=2) as response:
            try:
                response.raise_for_status()
                return True
            except requests.exceptions.HTTPError:
                return False
    except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError:
        return False
    return True
    
for x in range (0,numberofscans):
    for ping in range (2,255):
        percentage=ping*100/(255*numberofscans)+x*100/numberofscans
        with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
            file.write("scanning: "+str(percentage)+"%")
        address = "192.168.4." + str(ping)
        res = subprocess.call(['fping', '-c1', '-t30', '-q', address])
        if res == 0:
            f = open(dir+str(ping),"w+")
            f.write(str(ping))
            f.close()

for x in [f for f in os.listdir(dir)]:
    percentage=int(x)*100/255
    with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("connecting: "+str(percentage)+"%")
    address="http://192.168.4."+x+":1880/status.log"
    if test_slave_online(address)==False:
        os.remove(dir+x)
        #f = open(dir+str(x),"w+")
        #f.write(str(x))
        #f.close()


msg['options'] = [ f for f in os.listdir(dir)]
count=len([ f for f in os.listdir(dir)])
with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("found and connected "+str(count)+" clients")
return msg

func:
with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("waiting for initial scan or reload")
return msg

func:

with open("/home/pi/shared/commandtime.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(command))

name: send command
func:
import time
import os
import requests
import shutil

def status(message):
    with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(message)

current_milli_time = lambda: int(round(time.time() * 1000))
triggertime=int(current_milli_time())
status("taking photos in 5s")

with open("/home/pi/shared/command.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(triggertime+5000)+';take photo;3')
    
with open("/home/pi/shared/commandtime.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(triggertime))
time.sleep(1)
for x in range(5):
    status("taking photos in "+str(5-x-1)+"s")
    time.sleep(1)

status("initialize download")
time.sleep(3)

# ----- download images -----
dir='/home/pi/openscan/clients/'
clientlist=[ f for f in os.listdir(dir)]
count=1
for id in [ f for f in os.listdir(dir)]:
    status("downloding "+str(count)+" of "+str(len(clientlist)))
    url = 'http://192.168.4.'+id+':1880/photos/photo.jpg'
    image = requests.get(url, stream=False, timeout=4)
    with open("/home/pi/shared/photos/"+id+".jpg", 'wb') as f:
        f.write(image.content)
    count=count+1
status("zipping")
shutil.make_archive('/home/pi/shared/photos', 'zip','/home/pi/shared/photos/')
status("all images downloaded")
return msg

name: scan and write addresses
func:
# this will take 20s

import requests
import os

def test_slave_online(url):
    try:
        with requests.get(url, timeout=0.2) as response:
            try:
                response.raise_for_status()
                return True
            except requests.exceptions.HTTPError:
                return False
    except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError:
        return False
    return True

dir='/home/pi/openscan/clients/'

filelist = [ f for f in os.listdir(dir)]
for f in filelist:
    os.remove(os.path.join(dir, f))
count=0

for x in range(2, 255):
#for x in [63,152]:
    percentage=x*100/255
    with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
        file.write("scanning and connecting: "+str(percentage)+"%")
    address="http://192.168.4."+str(x)+":1880/status.log"
    if test_slave_online(address)==True:
        f = open(dir+str(x),"w+")
        f.write(str(x))
        f.close()
        count=count+1

msg['options'] = [ f for f in os.listdir(dir)]
with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
    file.write("found and connected "+str(count)+" clients")
return msg

name: Display Slave UI
format:
<iframe id="myFrame" width="570" height="650" frameBorder="1" src = ""></iframe>
<script>
(function(scope) {
    // watch msg object from Node-RED
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        // new message received
        var x = document.getElementById('myFrame');
        x.setAttribute('src', msg.payload); 
        });
})(scope);
</script>

    return msg
msg['payload']="http://192.168.4."+msg['payload']+":1880/ui"
return msg

format:

(function(scope) {
    // watch msg object from Node-RED
    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        // new message received
        var x = document.getElementById('myFrame2');
        x.setAttribute('src', msg.payload); 
        });
})(scope);
</script>

name: send command
func:
import time
import os
import requests

def status(message):
    with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(message)

current_milli_time = lambda: int(round(time.time() * 1000))
triggertime=int(current_milli_time())
status("shutting down in 5s")

with open("/home/pi/shared/command.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(triggertime+5000)+';shutdown;3')
    
with open("/home/pi/shared/commandtime.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(triggertime))
time.sleep(1)
for x in range(5):
    status("shutting down in "+str(5-x-1)+"s")
    time.sleep(1)
os.system("sudo shutdown -h now")

name: send command
func:
import time
import os
import requests

def status(message):
    with open("/home/pi/openscan/status.log", "w") as file:
        file.write(message)

current_milli_time = lambda: int(round(time.time() * 1000))
triggertime=int(current_milli_time())

update = requests.get('http://192.168.4.1:1880/updateslave.json', timeout=2)
with open("/home/pi/shared/command.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(triggertime)+';update;'+str(len(update.content)))
with open("/home/pi/shared/commandtime.log", "w") as file:
    file.write(str(triggertime))

time.sleep(1)
status("update send, rebooting all cameras now")


time.sleep(3)

name: download master update
func:
import os
import urllib2

def internet_on():
    try:
        urllib2.urlopen('http://216.58.192.142', timeout=1)
        pass
    except urllib2.URLError as err: 
        msg['payload']="No internet connection"
        return msg

def download(target,source):
    os.system("wget -O "+target+" "+source)

internet_on()
download("/home/pi/shared/master.json","https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/MultiRig/master.json")
download("/home/pi/shared/slave.json","https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OpenScanEu/OpenScan/master/MultiRig/slave.json")

msg['payload']="Download successful!"
return msg

name: install master
func:
import os

path="/home/pi/shared/master.json"

def test_file(filepath):
    if os.path.exists(filepath)==False:
        return "file does not exist"
    if os.stat(filepath).st_size==0 or os.stat(filepath).st_size==1:
        return "file empty"
    return "ok"

test=test_file(path)
if test!="ok":
    msg['payload']=test
    return [msg,[]]

os.system("sudo \cp "+path+" /home/pi/.node-red/flows_raspberrypi.json")
msg['payload']="Installation successful ... Rebooting"

return [msg,msg]
